item.description:
Because Rock Spot Climbing is our sponsor, we are fortunate enough for them to offer a discounted rate to Meetup members! Be sure to say thank you and let them know when arriving that you are with the Meetup Group!

Cost:

$10 (day pass w. own gear)
or
$15 (gear, lesson & day pass)


The address says Boston, but it's more like Hyde Park/Dedham area. Plenty of parking for those who drive.
Click Here for Directions!


If you're new and would like to learn, please be sure to call Rock Spot at least 24 hours in advance to schedule a belay lesson during the meetup time.
NOTE: If taking a lesson for the first time, please set aside 30-45 min. for the lesson during the Meetup.


All climbers will need to fill out a waiver and pass a belay test upon initial visit.

Please let me know if you have any questions. Feel free to use this wall for carpooling, pre-/post-dinner plans, etc. etc.
item.how_to_find_us: HOW TO FIND US: If you ask at the desk they can point in the right direction. Or look for the meetup name tag that I'll be wearing from my harness.
item.name: Sunday Fun Days Return!
